pages.text: You can earn coins as rewards from Neomanila Advancements, or when selling to Villagers.$(br2)100 $(item)Bronze coins/$ = 1 $(item)Silver coin/$$(br)100 $(item)Silver coins/$ = 1 $(item)Gold coin/$$(br2)Don't forget to right-click your coins while holding them in your hand. This will put them in the coin pouch in your inventory, which does $(l)not/$ drop when you die.
You spend these coins by trading them to other players via the Shop, or to buy items from Villagers.
